attributes.action: bring national service to any immigrants wanting to enter the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the prime minister to bring back national service full stop. but not just for british nationals. i would like the prime minister to bring this to anyone who wishes to seek asylum in this country rather than sponging off all the taxes and benefits that british nationals, who are in a worse situation, are being refused.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
